CustomField.description: Checked if any of the following are true: - Lead Status is MQL and Activity Count <1 - Lead Status is Working and Last Activity is > 16 days ago - Lead Status is Reached and Last Connect Date is > 30 days ago
CustomField.formula: IF( (ISPICKVAL(Status, "MQL") && Number_of_Attempts__c <1) || (ISPICKVAL(Status, "Working") && Last_Attempt_Date__c + 16 < today()) || (ISPICKVAL(Status, "Reached") && Last_Connect_Date__c + 30 < today()), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checked if any of the following are true: - Lead Status is MQL and Activity Count <1 - Lead Status is Working and Last Activity is > 16 days ago - Lead Status is Reached and Last Connect Date is > 30 days ago
CustomField.label: Missed SLA?
